website_summaries.verdict: An outstanding women's motorcycle jacket that blends fashion and function like never before.
pros: Consists of breathable polyester mesh with mesh panels that guarantees exceptional quality
Includes CE-approved Level-3 removable armor on the shoulders, elbows, and back
Reflective piping on the chest and upper back ensure maximum visibility
Lightweight, with an extra large jacket weighing just 2 pounds
Affordable jacket boasts a high-end look and feel
cons: Jacket is less durable than comparable options
Cannot adjust the ends of the jacket's sleeves

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The "armor" is more like foam and the mesh you can see straight through. Great for summer riding, super breathable for us arizonian riders. I was hoping for some stronger material but it should survive a small fall, not too sure about a slide... Hopefully I don't fall this summer, I'll just be using it until it starts too cool down then I'll go back to leather and buy a real textile jacket for next summer.
customer_reviews.author: Jesst

customer_reviews.title: Stylish with Level 3 armor.
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It's stylish, feels well made, and the armor is Level 3. I bought it to wear with my scooter, but despite the mesh, it's fairly heavy and still feels too hot for summer. Since my scooter only goes a top speed of 25 mph, I think I'm going to save it for longer trips or cooler weather, but I think it was a terrific deal for $64. My only question is that the armor for the shoulders is actually sewn into the outer edge of the upper arms. I'm not experienced enough to know if this is the usual placement.
customer_reviews.author: California Native

customer_reviews.title: Best Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my wife. Looks cool, solid protection and very durable. Zipper doesn't fail like many other jackets. Mesh allows airflow to keep you cool. Obviously mesh isn't for protecting against weather elements... so don't try to use it in snow or rain if you didn't know. This will last years! Update 1.5 years in: Speaking of years... still looks brand new. Bear in mind my wife doesn't ride nearly as much as I do. Regardless, such a good purchase and will keep using it until we wear it out.
customer_reviews.author: KP27

customer_reviews.title: good jacket for occasional use
customer_reviews.text: Jacket is lightweight and air moves through well. Quality for the price is good. However there are better quality jackets out there. This would be a good jacket for someone who only rides occasionally. The quality is not there for daily use. Also the crash protection would be light as the armor and materials are lightweight. In summary this is a good jacket for someone who does not want to spend big bucks on a jacket that will only get used a few times a year.
customer_reviews.author: Smallville

customer_reviews.title: runs big in the arms
customer_reviews.text: I think that if I would of gotten the right size I would have been much happier. I am pretty small at 125lbs. I purchased a medium thinking I would need the room in the chest area and while that part is fine, the arms are waaaay too big, even fastened as tight as it will go. Because of this, the armor in the shoulders and elbows do not sit where they should. I also wish it had a removable liner for the cold nights. Other than that, good quality for the price..you definitely get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: samantha

customer_reviews.title: Wrists Not Adjustable and Not Propotionate
customer_reviews.text: The end of the sleeves where the hands come out and the wrists are located cannot be adjusted. With all of the adjustable points on the arms, it is rediculous that this can be too large for someone while also being too tight for their hands to emerge from the sleeves. We cannot use this item any longer even though the torso still has more room for growth. These sleeves are poorly designed. We have to cut the jacket in order to use it and that makes it prone to further tearing.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Perry

customer_reviews.title: The jacket itself looks really nice..
customer_reviews.text: The jacket itself looks really nice...I wish as could've kept it. The size ran way to big, I ordered a Small, I'm normally between S/M on most tops, but I was swimming in this one, I think I might need a XXS. Unfortunately, there were no smaller sizes available, so I had to return it. If rated separately, appearance would receive 5 stars, and size 2 stars, so overall, the average is 3. I mailed it back to the seller yesterday, so I'll update how quick the process is.
customer_reviews.author: H. Le

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I found this great deal! I love the fit, I love the color, I love the mesh, I love the padding. The padding can be removed if I don't want it. Great fitting jacket for motorcycle rides, comfortable, and just what I was looking for without spending a fortune!
customer_reviews.author: addictedtoamazon

customer_reviews.title: This seemed like it would be a decent jacket for riding my ...
customer_reviews.text: This seemed like it would be a decent jacket for riding my scooter, but the sizing chart was not accurate. A 5x should have fit me, but was too small and I had to return and buy a different jacket which was sized properly.
customer_reviews.author: Jenidactyl

customer_reviews.title: be careful!
customer_reviews.text: The jacket is fine. However the customer service us not. Be careful when you order this. If you don't pick a color ( there is only one color) it will default to size medium no matter what size you order. And then if you want return it you will have to pay to ship it back. That'sBS.. it was Amazon's fault not mine that I got the wrong size.I should not have to pay to ship it back.
customer_reviews.author: tts

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I like the quality of the jacket for this price. Unfortunately I need to exchange it for a size down. I am 5'3 and about 125 lbs and I ordered a medium. The shoulders are very bulky and the arms are too big for me. Hopefully the small will fit. But the jacket is otherwise good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... fit according to the size chart it felt absolutely horrible on. It was like a crunchy paper on ...
customer_reviews.text: Although this fit according to the size chart it felt absolutely horrible on. It was like a crunchy paper on the inside making me want to itch as soon as I put it on. It had a nice appearance but the fit and feel was horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Harp

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it! its exactly what I wanted. it'll be perfect for riding this summer
customer_reviews.author: SamBeth

customer_reviews.title: OVERALL GOOD PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I found the jacket to be of good quality but the size seems a little small for the fit. I purchased a Medium and while it fits....it may run just a little small. The next size up would be to large but overall a good product.
customer_reviews.author: ABerry

customer_reviews.title: made a little small
customer_reviews.text: I love the jacket and its quality however it is made a little small.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Rice

customer_reviews.title: Would buy it again for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This coat has done me well for the first yr of riding. Then I upgraded to a real coat. It's all mesh great for summer high heat and it has pads. The zipper blew open twice in the yrs of owning so I don't use it any more. Kind of a pain in butt to have to zip up your coat while riding down the high way at 70 mph.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer hoover

customer_reviews.title: Great for summer/fall
customer_reviews.text: I like this light mesh jacket..armored!! I am 5'7 190lbs so I ordered and XL and it fits perfect...
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: It fits awesome and arrived quick
customer_reviews.text: It fits awesome and arrived quick! I'm 5'9 160lbs female Rider i typically buy large t-shirts my large jacket fit perfect!
customer_reviews.author: HAPPY AMAZONIAN

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I love the light weight and good looks. I ride in Florida where it keeps me cool enough when we ride and armor is firm but not uncomfortable. BEST Price anywhere
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Xelement CF508
customer_reviews.text: For the $$$ it is great! The armor is fair but I have some better armor to replace it with. Could be a few more pockets but all in all a great summer jacket! Size runs true to specs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but the larger size fits nicely. Its not too tight or loose
customer_reviews.text: Had to get a larger size than expected, but the larger size fits nicely. Its not too tight or loose. Great color!
customer_reviews.author: Leanne

customer_reviews.title: Very good warm weather motorcycle jacket
customer_reviews.text: Good Quality, Fits as expected. Vendor shipped promptly too. Would do business again
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: ladies motorcycle jacket
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my lady and she loves it it has a lot of in inner padding for protection great price during the cooler riding season it has a liner that you can zip in or out
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne C.

customer_reviews.title: I like this jacket
customer_reviews.text: I like this jacket. The mesh helps with airflow so your not hot and sweaty. Nice padding on back and elbows. Looks stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little scared that it wouldn't fit but it fit perfectly! Love my new riding jacket!!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy S.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and practical
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Arrived quickly and was what I was hoping for and more. I did order one size larger than normal and it fits perfect
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Ann Hammack

customer_reviews.title: Nice jacket!
customer_reviews.text: Nice riding jacket and the fit runs a little small in the chest area and wrist, but still a nice fit other wise. It looks great and is lite weight.
customer_reviews.author: hmmrav10

customer_reviews.title: Only reason for 4 stars is sizing is a bit ...
customer_reviews.text: Only reason for 4 stars is sizing is a bit snug I ordered for my gf and she loves it but it's a little snug. Shipping was fast too it got here 4 days ahead of scheduled
customer_reviews.author: Corey Owens

customer_reviews.title: ... come with a liner and the padding didn't feel comfortable. The company did an excellent job with refunding ...
customer_reviews.text: This jacket did not come with a liner and the padding didn't feel comfortable. The company did an excellent job with refunding so I purchased another jacket from them , which was better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Dorene

customer_reviews.title: A Dream
customer_reviews.text: Keeps you warm on a chilly day. But a chill will come though! I suggest you wear a sweatshirt under it on a really cool day. Ditch the sweatshirt and just wear the jacket later - perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Ouart

customer_reviews.title: Perfect jacket for summer!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for safety reasons, but found out quickly (on a night ride) that this is a summer jacket. It is not made to keep you warm, just safe. I like the jacket--although I think the size runs little just a bit. I wear 14 in jackets and this was a little snug for an XL, which I was surprised at. But, I can still wear it and it is nice-very breezy...
customer_reviews.author: Lisa J. Thomsen

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves it. Ultra light feels safe , easy too fold & keep in saddlebags when stopped somewhere. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It looks pretty and is comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Really cute jacket. It looks pretty and is comfortable. I usually wear XL-1X top and I ordered a 3X to be sure that it fit because some of the other reviews said that this jacket runs small, and the 3X fits and is a little big in the arms but the rest fits pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Good value, keeps me cool in summer
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, fits well, keeps me cool in the summer. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great!
customer_reviews.text: The colors matched perfectly to my other gear. It's light weight, and it breathes. Good for warm temperatures. Not for cold weather. I like the adjustable fit in the sleeves.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: I like the jacket more than I thought I would
customer_reviews.text: I like the jacket more than I thought I would. It's not the 200 dollar jacket from a bike dealer but for the price it will serve it's purpose. The pads could be better but for the price I will just change them. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: eyes

customer_reviews.title: but not for full figured gals like my wife
customer_reviews.text: It's an ok jacket, but not for full figured gals like my wife.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Fits great. Very breathable
customer_reviews.text: First off the item came on time. Fits great. Very breathable.
customer_reviews.author: Mariely D Sheridan

customer_reviews.title: This Jacket had been fabulous for biking and I readly ...
customer_reviews.text: This Jacket had been fabulous for biking and I readly appreciate ii, since three years ago I had highway speed motorcycle accident and was not expected to live since I landed on my head Had helmet thank go, and rolled eight times down the highway. Thank you Laura.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Helmer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great price, fits a little loose, good for summer weather.
customer_reviews.author: Mike L

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to ride in nice spring or fall weather
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to ride in nice spring or fall weather. Too hot for summer & too cold for winter. Fits a size smaller, but I was OK with that.
customer_reviews.author: Grace B

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking jacket, adjustable sleeves are nice. Fit seems to be true to size. Really good price for the quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: It is Very nice color. Nice and light. The Air blows through it for cooling. I Like everything about it.
customer_reviews.author: Michele I. McNeice

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: I thought the vents would actually vent, but they did not. No longer riding, so no longer a problem. I felt safe, but not comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Stern

customer_reviews.title: I stayed pretty cool. Good fit
customer_reviews.text: Wore the jacket with a cooling vest in 105 degree weather. I stayed pretty cool. Good fit. Comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.author: stacy christianson

customer_reviews.title: Nice armor jacket
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend loves it. Perfect. Went for a ride on Christmas Day, to celebrate. 45 degrees in NJ. Maybe add pix later.
customer_reviews.author: Hugh J Matlack

customer_reviews.title: Awesome jacket but one thing wrong is it needs bigger ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome jacket but one thing wrong is it needs bigger openings to get hands thru with gloves on, there is velcrow but not useful unless the sleeve openings was bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: This is a great lightweight but protective motorcycle jacket
customer_reviews.text: This is a great lightweight but protective motorcycle jacket. Has protection but not hot on a summer day, the mesh is awesome- it lets air flow right through it and keeps you nice and cool.I actually bought a lightweight sweater to wear under it for summer nights when it is a little cooler. I did as others suggested and ordered a size up than I normally wear and was happy that I did, fits me perfectly. Very happpy with this purchase. The colors are well represented online.
customer_reviews.author: daycare provider and mom

customer_reviews.title: order one size bigger
customer_reviews.text: we order one size bigger for the wife and it fit snug bit fit she liked it so that's all that mattered
customer_reviews.author: david grice

customer_reviews.title: lightweight and cute
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is inexpensive, but made well and very comfortable. If you are looking for a feminine, but protective motorcycle jacket, This is it. Sizing runs large.
customer_reviews.author: TheresaDNP

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed to find a heavy liner was not included. It is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: looks exactly the same as in picture, has decent ...
customer_reviews.text: looks exactly the same as in picture, has decent quality for the money; however, one shouldn't go for long trips with this as the armour isn't too strong.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: i LOVED this product
customer_reviews.text: i LOVED this product. Sizing is perfect. Color is great. I ordered a size small and im a size 8 and it fitted perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... jacket kind of looks bulky but it is a great buy for the money
customer_reviews.text: This jacket kind of looks bulky but it is a great buy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Great fit and is so nice
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Great fit and is so nice. - better than expected even. Great value
customer_reviews.author: Dori B. Elsila

customer_reviews.title: Love the jacket to go with the helmet that i ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the jacket to go with the helmet that i ordered to match but its a little big but i think me wearing more clothing under it will help
customer_reviews.author: charlene

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat this jacket for the price! I am very happy with this purchase. Looking for one for my husband now.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the Jacket very much, I just wish they had black and green instead of pink.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce M Heim

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Fit is great! The mesh lets air flow through keeping me cool while riding on hot days and the armor helps me feel safe and protected. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Happy wife, Happy life
customer_reviews.text: It was an unexpected gift for my wife. Who cried like a baby when she saw it, and of course posted a picture to all of her Facebook friends.
customer_reviews.author: Le'Roy Smith

customer_reviews.title: Jacket
customer_reviews.text: Had accidentally ordered the wrong size and sent back the first one. It took about a week and a half to get the right one.
customer_reviews.author: Karon Althaus

customer_reviews.title: Love it ******
customer_reviews.text: I love my jacket. I get so many compliment on it. And I have told people were to order it
customer_reviews.author: MiMi

customer_reviews.text: Its ok. The arms are big but the jacket run small. Really I don't understand why its like it is?
customer_reviews.author: T.L.C. great read!

customer_reviews.title: Good jacket
customer_reviews.text: Good jacket. Thicker than i expected but the air flows through it nicely. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Modrall

customer_reviews.title: Good summer riding jacket
customer_reviews.text: This was a nice jacket for summer. There is no liner, but I didn't mind bc it was for the summer good price
customer_reviews.author: The ladyb B

customer_reviews.title: it is falling apart after just 3 months of use
customer_reviews.text: the jacket is falling apart at the seams inside and causing my shirts to start to come apart due to the velcro inside holding the pads in the pockets inside i dont recommend this jacket. it is inexpensive but cheap. look for one that is not as cheap as this one you will thank me latter.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Ordonez

customer_reviews.title: wife liked had to buy her this one in pink
customer_reviews.text: A W E S O M E JACKET. wife liked had to buy her this one in pink. Great summer jacket as I don't ride without protection ever. So this was perfect for this and the snaps made it a tight fit. But one size larger than u wld snaps bring jacket tight in arms so a xl will pull down to large and waste adjust to.
customer_reviews.author: Polar Pyro

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described.
customer_reviews.text: I chose a 4 star only because the fit is a little small. I am an xl and after reading other reviews I decided to get a xxl. Glad I did!! The xxl is just a little big where I am sure the xl would have been too tight. The material is soft and pliable mesh that feels good to wear and the armor fits exactly where it is supposed to. All in all, I made a good choice for my first riding jacket!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awful jacket
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap and cheesy. Wouldn't protect you at all in a lay down. Sent it back and had to pay return shipping. Spent $20 total shipping for something that I didn't keep. Absolutely awful jacket.
customer_reviews.author: dlcarr

product_meta.title: Xelement CF508 Women's Black and Pink Mesh Jacket with Advanced Level-3 Armor
product_meta.description:
Xelement CF508 Women's Black and Pink Mesh Jacket with X-Armor Protection

This Xelement CF508 Ladies Foam Mesh Jacket Is Made of Breathable Polyester and Mesh Material. Its Safety Features Include CE Approved X-Armor Removable Armor on Shoulders, Elbows. Reflective Piping on The Chest and Upper Back. Removable Foam Based Armor on the Back. The Mesh Panels on This Jacket Are Very Breathable, Making It Perfect for Sustaining the Heat Of Those Hot Summer Days! If You Have Looked at More Expensive Jackets and Are Not Wanting to Spend That Type Of Money, Take A Look At The Reviews Of This Jacket And Realize That You Are Getting The Most Bang For Your Buck! Sold Exclusively At Leatherup, The Most Popular Online Motorcycle Store 

Jacket Features:

 * Made Of Breathable Polyester Black Mesh Fabric With Pink Mesh Panels
 * Super-Light Materials (XL Size Weights Less Than 2 Pounds)
 * Breathable Polyester Black Mesh Lining
 * Mandarin Collar
 * Media Pocket with Wire Feed
 * Dual Gun Pocket
 * Front Zippered Closure
 * Pockets included: 2 Zippered Front Hand Pockets ,1 Interior Pocket with Velcro Closure
 * Waist Side Straps for Adjustable Fit
 * Cuffs with Velcro Straps for Adjustable fit
 * Adjustable Sleeve Take-Up Straps at the Forearm and Bicep to Help Secure Elbow Armor and Material
 * Silver Reflective
 * Reflective Piping on Chest and Upper Back for Night Visibility
 * Removable CE-Approved on Shoulders and Elbows 
 *  CE Approved Armor Passing the Highest Level EN1621-1 and EN1621-2 Impact Tests
 * X-Armor Advanced Technology Armor: Ergonomic Design, Higher Impact Absorption, Free Movement
 * Removable Back Foam Armor (under lining)
feature_bullets: Breathable Polyester Black Mesh Fabric With Pink Mesh Panels
Super-Light Materials (Xl Size Weights Less Than 2 Pounds)
